entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning early in the morning and ending near noon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 22. Humidex 29. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 12.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of thundershowers in the evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
